columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of container creation or deletion. The status is one of the following: 'CREATING', 'ACTIVE', or 'DELETING'.

columns.name: access_logging_enabled
columns.description: The state of access logging on the container. This value is false by default, indicating that AWS Elemental MediaStore does not send access logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. When you enable access logging on the container, MediaStore changes this value to true, indicating that the service delivers access logs for objects stored in that container to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The Unix timestamp that the container was created.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The DNS endpoint of the container.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The contents of the access policy.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the contents of the access policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the container
